This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0142 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ACT Active dutyActive duty
RET RetiredRetired
DEC DeceasedDeceased

name: MilitaryStatus
title: militaryStatus
description: Code system of concepts  which specify the military status of the patient.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PD1 segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0142 (Military Status)
